name: Unstable Code
description:
Hello everyone,

This is my submission for LDJ49 and was made in 48 hours by me as a solo participant. The theme was unstable.

The game focuses as if the code of the game was unstable itself. There are a lot of tutorials throughout the game and hopefully, they will explain the game itself.

A and D to move. Space to jump. Sorry, I forgot to use the W key also as a jump key.

Thank you.
